title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - E-jets 175 - calibrating the throttle
description:
In this video we will look at how you can calibrate the throttling mechanism of the E-jet 175/Embraer 175 which has received a new update. The calibration system has been added with the latest update and allows you now to more accurately use your throttling part of the joystick.

After having a look at how to install it we will walk through the panel to see what functionalities are available.
